proposal: Diving into the world of BirdDog (0x70), it's clear you've mastered the art of chill vibes and pizza love, just like Matt Furie envisioned. With 351 holders on the ETH network, you're not just a character in a series but a growing community! Imagine enhancing this vibe with your own DEX or engaging the community further with a blockchain-based lottery. Let's bring the essence of BirdDog into the blockchain space, one slice at a time.
